Title: IS_IPV6
Description: Returns 1 if the expression is a valid IPv6 address specified as a string, otherwise returns 0. Does not consider IPv4 addresses to be valid IPv6 addresses.
Wrong Messages from Ineffective SQLs Ref:
(pymysql.err.ProgrammingError) (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near '(0.02 sec)\n\nSELECT IS_IPV6('10.0.1.1')' at line 1")
[SQL: set (0.02 sec)

SELECT IS_IPV6('10.0.1.1');]
(Background on this error at: https://sqlalche.me/e/20/f405)
